tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Command Injection via Unsafe Subprocess Execution where the attachment extraction feature directly concatenates user-controlled filenames into a shell command without sanitization, enabling attackers to exploit this by crafting malicious filenames containing shell metacharacters (e.g., semicolons or backticks) to execute arbitrary commands on the system, potentially leading to unauthorized access, data theft, or full compromise.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a vulnerable version of the package.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `mbox-to-json` library to the patch version.
vulnerable_to: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
